entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: Like I said last night: as soon as Trump could no longer do his two-hour campaign rallies from the White House, he got bored with the Coronavirus and just doesn't really care to deal with it anymore.
